com.facebook.buck.jvm.java

Interface MavenPublishable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AllowsNonAnnotatedFields, BuildEngineAction, BuildRule, Comparable<BuildRule>, HasMavenCoordinates, HasNameAndType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Javadoc, MavenUberJar, MavenUberJar.SourceJar

    public interface MavenPublishable
extends HasMavenCoordinates
    A BuildRule that can have its output(BuildRule.getSourcePathToOutput()) published to a maven repository under the maven coordinates provided by HasMavenCoordinates.getMavenCoords()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<HasMavenCoordinates> getMavenDeps()
      When published, these will be listed in pom.xml as dependencies
      Iterable<BuildRule> getPackagedDependencies()
      When published, these will be included in the artifact.
      Optional<SourcePath> getPomTemplate() 

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.jvm.core.HasMavenCoordinates

        getMavenCoords, isMavenCoordsPresent

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.core.rules.BuildRule

        compareTo, getBuildDeps, getBuildSteps, getBuildTarget, getFullyQualifiedName, getProjectFilesystem, getSourcePathToOutput, hasBuildSteps, isCacheable, outputFileCanBeCopied, shouldRespectInputSizeLimitForRemoteExecution, toString, updateBuildRuleResolver

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.core.build.action.BuildEngineAction

        getDependencies, getSourcePathOutputs

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.core.rules.HasNameAndType

        getType

    • Method Detail

      • getMavenDeps

        Iterable<HasMavenCoordinates> getMavenDeps()
        When published, these will be listed in pom.xml as dependencies

      • getPackagedDependencies

        Iterable<BuildRule> getPackagedDependencies()
        When published, these will be included in the artifact. This, getMavenDeps(), and the transitive dependencies of those maven deps would form the complete set of transitive dependencies for the artifact.

      • getPomTemplate

        Optional<SourcePath> getPomTemplate()
        Returns:
        A template for the pom.xml to be generated when publishing this artifact.
